Project

A Project object in Paper.js is what usually is refered to as the document: The top level object that holds all the items contained in the scene graph. As the term document is already taken in the browser context, it is called Project.

Projects allow the manipluation of the styles that are applied to all newly created items, give access to the selected items, and will in future versions offer ways to query for items in the scene graph defining specific requirements, and means to persist and load from different formats, such as SVG and PDF.

The currently active project can be accessed through the global {@see _global_#project} variable.

An array of all open projects is accessible through the global {@see _global_#projects} variable.

Constructors

Project()
Project()

Creates a Paper.js project.

When working with PaperScript, a project is automatically created for us and the global {@see _global_#project} variable points to it.

Properties

currentStyle
currentStyle

The currently active path style. All selected items and newly created items will be styled with this style.

    Type:
  • PathStyle

Example

Run

Example

Run
index
index

The index of the project in the global projects array.

    Type:
  • Number
selectedItems
selectedItems

The selected items contained within the project.

    Type:
  • Array of Item objects

Project Hierarchy

layers
layers

The layers contained within the project.

    Type:
  • Array of Layer objects
activeLayer
activeLayer

The layer which is currently active. New items will be created on this layer by default.

    Type:
  • Layer
symbols
symbols

The symbols contained within the project.

    Type:
  • Array of Symbol objects
views
views

The views contained within the project.

    Type:
  • Array of View objects
activeView
activeView

The view which is currently active.

    Type:
  • View

Methods

activate()
activate()

Activates this project, so all newly created items will be placed in it.

remove()
remove()

Removes this project from the global {@see _global_#projects} list.

selectAll()
selectAll()

Selects all items in the project.

deselectAll()
deselectAll()

Deselects all selected items in the project.
